item.title: Automated Weekly Review in Obsidian
item.description: mode:: #mode/youtuberüèôÔ∏è kind:: #Project/Articlesüì∞ status:: #Status/Focus‚ùó %%(post in progress, here are some quick notes) waiting for when I summarize YT Video - automated weekly review in obsidian and maybe the comment I had explaining where the weekly review fits into daily schedule%% What’s in a Weekly Review My weekly review is based off the GTD weekly review. Think of it as being more intentional about what you are spending your time on and as a catch-all for todos that you can’t immediately do.
